data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: Me and my father run a local petrol station here in the uk. I have an awful habit of smoking, so my dad doesn't let me near the diesel and petrol pumps as he's afraid I could burn the place down. I don't think he's wrong though. He is just looking out for me. I only really work on the till because of this.
data.original_output: Me and my father run a local petrol station here in the uk. I have an awful habit of smoking, so my dad doesn't let me near the diesel and petrol pumps as he's affraid I could burn the place down. I don't think he's wrong though. He is just looking out for me. I only really work on the till because of this.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: Today I sold one of my skylanders. I went to tescos to send it to the buyer. They have an evri machine which prints out the label/stamp. It was so easy. I did it with a box, not sure if you can do it with a letter.
data.original_output: Today I sold one of my skylanders. I went to tescos to send it to the buyer. they have an evri machine which prints out the label/stamp. It was so easy. I did it with a box, not sure if you can do it with a letter.

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: In 2142, the British empire has a problem. With the lack of jobs many have turned to organ sharks. If you take a loan from them and don't pay them back they give you a warning. After some time has passed, and you still don't comply, they come and gut you for what you have usually taking a liver or kidney. Gutted people are called husks which are marked by the organ sharks.
data.original_output: In 2142, the British empire has a problem. With the lack of jobs many have turned to organ sharks. If you take a loan from them and don't pay them back they give you a warning. After some time has passed, and you still don't comply, they come and gut you for what you have usually taking a liver or kidney. Gutted people are called husks which are marked by the organ sharks.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: To exist in this world you must make a payment, the second you are born that payment is your life. To exist and feel in this world you must experience extremes. How can you know happiness without knowing sadness. How can you feel excitement without knowing gloom.
data.original_output: To exist in this world you must make a payment, the second you are born that payment is your life. To exist and feel in this world you must experience extremes. How can you know happiness without knowing sadness. How can you feel excitement without knowing gloom.
